Title: Requires persons possessing any firearm to hold a firearms safety certificate
Summary: Requires persons possessing any firearm to hold a firearms safety certificate; establishes application and training process therefor; makes technical corrections.
LawCode: Amd ยง265.01, add ยง400.15, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to requiring persons possessing a firearm to hold a firearms safety certificate; and to provide technical corrections to such law
